title: DP Moto Skill Definition
description: Composable reactive behaviors for autonomous play testing

type.description: action=fire-and-forget, reactive=observe→decide→act loop, compound=chain of sub-skills

description.description: Human-readable description of what this skill does

params.description: Parameters the skill accepts (keys are param names, values are defaults)

requires.description: State requirements for the skill to be applicable

states.description: Game states where this skill can run (e.g. ['PLAYING'])

commands.description: For tier 0: sequence of game commands to execute

delay.description: ms to wait before this command

logic.description: For tier 1+: name of the built-in logic function to run

subSkills.description: For tier 2: ordered list of sub-skill names to chain
